item.title: Taxes for Freelancers: The Pros and Cons of Registering Your Freelance Income as an LLC or S-Corp
item.description: If you’ve been freelancing on the side of your full-time job over the past few years, you’re not alone. In three short years, gig workers are expected to rake in over $450 billion.

item.title: Can I pay With PayPal?
item.description: You can pay yearly with PayPal. Afraid we do not provide an option for monthly billing. In order to pay with PayPal simply click one of the buttons below.

item.title: How can I pay for Skyclerk?
item.description: We accept all major credit cards. Although we are unable to accept other forms of payment, you can pay for several months in advance if you prefer.

item.title: Does Skyclerk work on my Mac?
item.description: Because Skyclerk is web-based it works on any computer with a current web browser and internet connection. We also offer Skyclerk as a mobile application.

item.title: How do I cancel my Skyclerk account?
item.description: Skyclerk is a pay-as-you-go service. You commit for only one month at a time. One possible alternative to canceling your paid Skyclerk account is to simply downgrade to the free plan.

item.title: How do I log in to my Skyclerk account?
item.description: You can log in to your Skyclerk account by visiting https://app.skyclerk.com/login and entering your email address and password.

item.title: Dealing with Covid-19 - Small Business or Freelancer Depression
item.description: If you are a small business owner or sole entrepreneur and you need financial help please visit the Small Business Administrationâ€™s support website.

item.title: Skyclerk 3.0 Has Arrived - Crazy Fast Bookkeeping Software
item.description: In June of this year, we announced that Skyclerk was changing -- changing for the better. We were saying goodbye to the Cloudmanic Labs umbrella and taking on the world as just Skyclerk.

item.title: If you Run a Small Business Park In the Back of the Parking Lot
item.description: Just about every morning as I drop my daughter off at daycare I have a bit of nostalgia for an important business lesson my dad taught me as a kid -- as a small business owner you should always park your car in the back of the parking lot.

item.title: Cheapest Bookkeeping Software on the Market
item.description: Today, I am very pleased to announce we are cutting the price of Skyclerk by 60% making it the cheapest bookkeeping software on the market.

item.title: A New Skyclerk is Coming - today we release a new site
item.description: This coming August, Skyclerk will turn 9 years old. Today, we have tens of thousands of users and have grown month over month since the day we launched, without any help from a venture capitalist or outside funding.

item.title: Is there a Skyclerk iPhone application?
item.description: Sure is! You can download Skyclerk for IOS in the Apple App Store.

item.title: What is Snap!Clerk?
item.description: Snap!Clerk is a feature of Skyclerk that organizes all of those receipts you acquire wherever your busy life takes you: the gas station, grocery store, airport, cafe, gym .

item.title: How to change your currency?
item.description: Skyclerk supports many different currencies. Currently, you can only update your currency via our web application (mobile does not support currency settings).

item.title: Is there a Skyclerk Android application?
item.description: Sure is! You can download Skyclerk for Android in the Google App Store.

item.title: Uploading receipts via email
item.description: A convenient feature of Snap!Clerk is the ability to upload receipts via email. Simply attach a receipt image to an email and send it to a unique, secure email address linked to your Skyclerk account.

item.title: How do I import my ledger from a CSV?
item.description: One of the most useful Skyclerk features for new users is the ability to import past ledger entries via a CSV file.

item.title: Contact Skyclerk Support
Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy Skyclerk is a Cloudmanic Labs, LLC Company Cloudmanic Labs, LLC is committed to honoring the privacy of its users.

item.title: Refunds
item.description: Refund Policy All paid plans must enter a valid credit card. Free accounts are not required to provide a credit card number.

item.title: Terms of Service
item.description: Terms of Service Agreement to Terms of Use Skyclerk is a Cloudmanic Labs, LLC Company These Terms and Conditions of Use (the Terms of Use) apply to the Cloudmanic Labs, LLC web site located at cloudmanic.
